ygData.subject: Re: Manastone usage?
ygData.msgSnippet: i have a manastone and it works quite well...right click it, and you exchange 60hp for 30mana...sort of a bad ratio, but when you have an ac and hp buff on
ygData.messageBody:
i have a manastone and it works quite well...right click it, and you exchange
60hp for 30mana...sort of a bad ratio, but when you have an ac and hp buff on
along with a symbol spell, it works pretty good...and our clerical
method....stone down as low as you can without killing yourself <yes it can be
done, laughed my butt off when a guildmate did it (; >, then CH up...wash,
rinse, and repeat....not advisable in a dangerous spot, but still, it's very
useful (:

(\/)ystix

Paul Heenan wrote:

> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
> Hey guys,
>
> Does anybody have one of these Manastones? If so, exactly how do you use it?
> Is there a strategy to it? If it converts HP to Mana, then how do you stay
> alive with less HP available? I read about high level Druids and Shaman
> using their "regeneration" line of spells to get HP back as they use it. Is
> there a similar way to use it for us Clerics? Any tips would be appreciated.
>
> Thanks,
> Drizben D'vorn
> Defiled Priest of Innoruuk
>
>
